original_text: Impress them on your children. Talk about them when you sit at home and when you walk along the road, when you lie down and when you get up.
korean_text: 네 자녀에게 부지런히 가르치며 집에 앉았을 때에든지 길을 갈 때에든지 누워 있을 때에든지 일어날 때에든지 이 말씀을 강론할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Talk about them when you sit at home
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 집에 앉았을 때에 그것들을 말하며

sentences.original_text: when you walk along the road
